mapper.sql: ID, CATEGORY_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, NAME, BRAND, MODELS, SIZE, ORGIN, EXPIRATION_DATE, PRODUCER, REFERENCE_PRICE, PRODUCT_PIC, QR_CODE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_PRODUCTS (ID, CATEGORY_ID, SUPPLIER_ID, NAME, BRAND, MODELS, SIZE, ORGIN, EXPIRATION_DATE, PRODUCER, REFERENCE_PRICE, PRODUCT_PIC, QR_CODE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT ) values (#{id}, #{categoryId}, #{supplierId}, #{name}, #{brand}, #{models}, #{size}, #{orgin}, #{expirationDate}, #{producer}, #{referencePrice}, #{productPic}, #{qrCode}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )

mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_PRODUCTS
CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId},
SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId},
NAME = #{name},
BRAND = #{brand},
MODELS = #{models},
SIZE = #{size},
ORGIN = #{orgin},
EXPIRATION_DATE = #{expirationDate},
PRODUCER = #{producer},
REFERENCE_PRICE = #{referencePrice},
PRODUCT_PIC = #{productPic},
QR_CODE = #{qrCode},
CREATED_AT = #{createdAt},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt},
where ID = #{id}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_PRODUCTS set CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId}, SUPPLIER_ID = #{supplierId}, NAME = #{name}, BRAND = #{brand}, MODELS = #{models}, SIZE = #{size}, ORGIN = #{orgin}, EXPIRATION_DATE = #{expirationDate}, PRODUCER = #{producer}, REFERENCE_PRICE = #{referencePrice}, PRODUCT_PIC = #{productPic}, QR_CODE = #{qrCode}, CREATED_AT = #{createdAt}, UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt} where ID = #{id}
